structure.unit: ARTICLE XCI. SOUTH-DADE VENTURE COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

law.catch_line: [No district bonds or debts to constitute debts or obligations of the county.]

text.section:
Sec. 2-1331. [No district bonds or debts to constitute debts or obligations of the county.]
No bond, debt or other obligation of the South-Dade Venture Community Development District, nor any default thereon, shall constitute a debt or obligation of Miami-Dade County, except upon the express approval and agreement of the Miami Dade Board of County Commissioners.
